alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 1:02PM EST until January 14 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Delaware, central, northern and southern New Jersey and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An abrupt wind shift and wind speed will occur with a frontal passage this afternoon and may be accompanied by snow showers. Strong winds will persist into early this evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia
